Categories: Movies & TV, Musicals & Performing Arts, Musicals
Product Description: ['The sequel to the 1978 hit movie, GREASE 2 is set in the early 1960\x92s when a new British student, Michael Carrington (Caulfield), rides into town and joins the ranks at Rydell High. A book nerd who immediately falls for the blonde bombshell leader of the Pink Ladies, Stephanie Zinone (Pfeiffer), Michael finds himself smitten, but out of his element. Knowing that the Pink Ladies are the hippest clique of chicks at Rydell, who only date their equals in coolness - the T-Birds, Michael sets out to turn from a geek to a greaser to see if he can win the gorgeous Stephanie\x92s heart.']
Average Rating: 4.7

Product Title: The Brothers Grimm
Review Date: 2015/11/29
Store: Matt Damon  (Actor),     Heath Ledger  (Actor),     Terry Gilliam  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Miramax Home Entertainment, All Titles
Product Description: ["Matt Damon (THE BOURNE SUPREMACY, OCEAN'S TWELVE) and Heath Ledger (THE PATRIOT, A KNIGHT'S TALE) team up to bring you one of the year's most fantastic adventures in this magical tale based on the lives of the legendary storytellers. Will and Jake Grimm (Damon and Ledger) dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, but when the brothers journey into a real enchanted forest they encounter many of the fantastic characters and thrilling situations found in their beloved fairy tales! From the award-winning director of 12 MONKEYS, BRAZIL and MONTY PYTHON AND THE HOLY GRAIL, this fabulous motion picture is sure to leave you living happily ever after!"]
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Monica Bellucci, Charles Roven, Vaclav Chalupa, Uma Thurman, Matt Damon, Richard Ridings, Rudolf Pellar, Ota Filip, Heath Ledger, Jonathan Pryce, Jakub Zindulka, Petr Ratimec, Tomas Hanak, Roger Ashton-Griffiths, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey, Terry Gilliam, Miroslav Táborský, Julian Bleach, Daniel Bobker, Jan Unger, Mackenzie Cook, Audrey Hamm, Bruce MacEwenMonica Bellucci, Charles Roven, Vaclav Chalupa, Uma Thurman, Matt Damon, Richard Ridings, Rudolf Pellar, Ota Filip, Heath Ledger, Jonathan Pryce, Jakub Zindulka, Petr Ratimec, Tomas Hanak, Roger Ashton-Griffiths, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey, Terry Gilliam, Miroslav Tábor…  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Studio': 'Miramax Lionsgate', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Director': 'Terry Gilliam', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Release date': 'January 8, 2013', 'Actors': 'Matt Damon, Heath Ledger, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey, Jonathan Pryce', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Daniel Bobker, Charles Roven', 'Number of discs': '1'}

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
Review Date: 2017/06/20
Store: Heath Ledger  (Actor),     Christopher Plummer  (Actor),     Terry Gilliam  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Enter a dazzling world of fantasy in The Imaginarium of Dr. Parnassus,Director Terry Gilliam’s magical adventure tale starring Heath Ledger in his last film role along with Christopher Plummer, Johnny Depp, Colin Farrell and Jude Law. In exchange for extraordinary powers, Dr. Parnassus (Plummer)makes a deal with the Devil to turn over any child of his when they turn sixteen. But as his daughter Valentina’s (Lily Cole) birthday approaches, a mysterious stranger(Ledger) arrives with the power to change everything. In this captivating, explosive and wonderfully imaginative race against time, Dr. Parnassus must fight to save his daughter in a never-ending landscape of surreal obstacles - and undo the mistakes of his past once and for all!', 'Amazon.com', "Terry Gilliam has long admired Marcel Carné's beautiful and tragic", 'Children of Paradise', '(he even contributes an introduction to the Criterion Collection edition). In', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', ', among his more phantasmagorical features, Gilliam conjures up his own unique theatrical troupe. Led by the immortal Parnassus (Christopher Plummer, whose daughter, Amanda, appeared in', 'The Fisher King', '), Anton (', 'Boy A', '\'s Andrew Garfield), Percy (Verne Troyer), and the doctor\'s doll-faced daughter, Valentina (model Lily Cole), travel through 21st-century London in their stagecoach set. Times are tight and the quartet is starting to unravel when they rescue Tony, a philanthropist (Heath Ledger, reuniting with Gilliam for the last time), from the Russian mob. Though Anton pines for Valentina, she falls for the new fellow, who charms female viewers into opening up their wallets. Little do the ladies realize they risk their souls when they pass through the Imaginarium, a Mylar mirror that leads to alternate realities (where Johnny Depp, Jude Law, and Colin Farrell play Tony\'s doppelgängers). As it transpires, Parnassus made a Faustian bargain with Mr. Nick (Tom Waits, whom Gilliam considers "America\'s greatest musical poet") centuries before and must supply Satan with five souls by Valentina\'s 16th birthday or Nick will take her away from him--permanently. One of the movie\'s more haunting lines, "Nothing is forever, not even death," could serve as an epitaph for Ledger, who died from an accidental overdose during filming, but lives again in the erratic, yet imaginative Gilliam\'s most purely enjoyable film since', 'Time Bandits', '.', '--Kathleen C. Fennessy', 'Stills from', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', '(Click for larger image)']
Average Rating: 4.5

['Product Description', 'Enter a dazzling world of fantasy in The Imaginarium of Dr. Parnassus,Director Terry Gilliam’s magical adventure tale starring Heath Ledger in his last film role along with Christopher Plummer, Johnny Depp, Colin Farrell and Jude Law. In exchange for extraordinary powers, Dr. Parnassus (Plummer)makes a deal with the Devil to turn over any child of his when they turn sixteen. But as his daughter Valentina’s (Lily Cole) birthday approaches, a mysterious stranger(Ledger) arrives with the power to change everything. In this captivating, explosive and wonderfully imaginative race against time, Dr. Parnassus must fight to save his daughter in a never-ending landscape of surreal obstacles - and undo the mistakes of his past once and for all!', 'Amazon.com', "Terry Gilliam has long admired Marcel Carné's beautiful and tragic", 'Children of Paradise', '(he even contributes an introduction to the Criterion Collection edition). In', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', ', among his more phantasmagorical features, Gilliam conjures up his own unique theatrical troupe. Led by the immortal Parnassus (Christopher Plummer, whose daughter, Amanda, appeared in', 'The Fisher King', '), Anton (', 'Boy A', '\'s Andrew Garfield), Percy (Verne Troyer), and the doctor\'s doll-faced daughter, Valentina (model Lily Cole), travel through 21st-century London in their stagecoach set. Times are tight and the quartet is starting to unravel when they rescue Tony, a philanthropist (Heath Ledger, reuniting with Gilliam for the last time), from the Russian mob. Though Anton pines for Valentina, she falls for the new fellow, who charms female viewers into opening up their wallets. Little do the ladies realize they risk their souls when they pass through the Imaginarium, a Mylar mirror that leads to alternate realities (where Johnny Depp, Jude Law, and Colin Farrell play Tony\'s doppelgängers). As it transpires, Parnassus made a Faustian bargain with Mr. Nick (Tom Waits, whom Gilliam considers "America\'s greatest musical poet") centuries before and must supply Satan with five souls by Valentina\'s 16th birthday or Nick will take her away from him--permanently. One of the movie\'s more haunting lines, "Nothing is forever, not even death," could serve as an epitaph for Ledger, who died from an accidental overdose during filming, but lives again in the erratic, yet imaginative Gilliam\'s most purely enjoyable film since', 'Time Bandits', '.', '--Kathleen C. Fennessy', 'Stills from', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', '(Click for larger image)']

Product Title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
Review Date: 2017/06/20
Store: Heath Ledger  (Actor),     Christopher Plummer  (Actor),     Terry Gilliam  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Enter a dazzling world of fantasy in The Imaginarium of Dr. Parnassus,Director Terry Gilliam’s magical adventure tale starring Heath Ledger in his last film role along with Christopher Plummer, Johnny Depp, Colin Farrell and Jude Law. In exchange for extraordinary powers, Dr. Parnassus (Plummer)makes a deal with the Devil to turn over any child of his when they turn sixteen. But as his daughter Valentina’s (Lily Cole) birthday approaches, a mysterious stranger(Ledger) arrives with the power to change everything. In this captivating, explosive and wonderfully imaginative race against time, Dr. Parnassus must fight to save his daughter in a never-ending landscape of surreal obstacles - and undo the mistakes of his past once and for all!', 'Amazon.com', "Terry Gilliam has long admired Marcel Carné's beautiful and tragic", 'Children of Paradise', '(he even contributes an introduction to the Criterion Collection edition). In', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', ', among his more phantasmagorical features, Gilliam conjures up his own unique theatrical troupe. Led by the immortal Parnassus (Christopher Plummer, whose daughter, Amanda, appeared in', 'The Fisher King', '), Anton (', 'Boy A', '\'s Andrew Garfield), Percy (Verne Troyer), and the doctor\'s doll-faced daughter, Valentina (model Lily Cole), travel through 21st-century London in their stagecoach set. Times are tight and the quartet is starting to unravel when they rescue Tony, a philanthropist (Heath Ledger, reuniting with Gilliam for the last time), from the Russian mob. Though Anton pines for Valentina, she falls for the new fellow, who charms female viewers into opening up their wallets. Little do the ladies realize they risk their souls when they pass through the Imaginarium, a Mylar mirror that leads to alternate realities (where Johnny Depp, Jude Law, and Colin Farrell play Tony\'s doppelgängers). As it transpires, Parnassus made a Faustian bargain with Mr. Nick (Tom Waits, whom Gilliam considers "America\'s greatest musical poet") centuries before and must supply Satan with five souls by Valentina\'s 16th birthday or Nick will take her away from him--permanently. One of the movie\'s more haunting lines, "Nothing is forever, not even death," could serve as an epitaph for Ledger, who died from an accidental overdose during filming, but lives again in the erratic, yet imaginative Gilliam\'s most purely enjoyable film since', 'Time Bandits', '.', '--Kathleen C. Fennessy', 'Stills from', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', '(Click for larger image)']

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual's shopping behavior reveals a strong preference for movies, particularly in genres that encompass musicals, fantasy, and drama. They gravitate towards films with engaging narratives, often rooted in historical or imaginative themes, and show enthusiasm for productions featuring notable actors and directors. A consistent high rating reflects a positive sentiment toward quality storytelling and entertaining content, with average ratings primarily clustered between 4.5 and 5.0.

They exhibit a tendency to appreciate well-constructed plots that provoke emotional responses, indicating a desire for substance in film experiences rather than superficial entertainment. Quality appears to be prioritization over price, suggesting that they are less sensitive to cost, as long as the viewing experience meets their expectations.

The recurring inclusion of ratings that respond to unique, thought-provoking stories indicates a preference for films where character development and moral dilemmas are present. This consumer leans towards more mature content with advisory notes on violence and substance use, reflecting a willingness to engage with complex and possibly controversial themes. Overall, their core preferences center around high-quality films with rich narratives, memorable performances, and an inclination toward fantastical or serious storytelling.

target_interaction.title: Better than Sliced Bread
target_interaction.text: This movie is the best possible consequence of the industrial revolution. The production value, casting, and animation all combine to create the most breath-taking piece of film I have ever had the pleasure of witnessing. Not only am I now deathly afraid to enter any pool, lake, marina, or sea- I have also developed a molecular fear of water. My wife offered me a glass of water after mowing the lawn this morning and I was escorted to the hospital by means of ambulance. I am now in therapy, but given the chance, I'd still watch the movie again.
